sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		CHROM as string,
		POS as string,
		ID as string,
		REF as string,
		ALT as string,
		QUAL as string,
		FILTER as string,
		INFO as string,
		FORMAT as string,
		MUESTRA as string,
		VALOR as string,
		ORIGEN as string,
		FECHA_COPIA as timestamp,
		RESULTADO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	batchSize: 1,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
